languages.text: "Он имел честь помогать вашему предку добыть эту святыню". {n}Мариус с благоговением указывает на реликварий.{/n} "В жестокой схватке он не только врачевал бойцов, но и сам проливал кровь за правое дело".

"He had the honour of helping an ancestor of yours capture this relic." {n}Marius points piously toward the reliquary.{/n} "In that gruelling fight, he not only treated the wounded soldiers but shed blood for the cause himself."
languages.original_text: "Он имел честь помогать вашему предку добыть эту святыню". {n}Мариус с благоговением указывает на реликварий.{/n} "В жестокой схватке он не только врачевал бойцов, но и сам проливал кровь за правое дело".

traits.locale_text: "He had the honour of helping an ancestor of yours capture this relic." {n}Marius points piously toward the reliquary.{/n} "In that gruelling fight, he not only treated the wounded soldiers but shed blood for the cause himself."

"He had the honour of helping an ancestor of yours capture this relic." {n}Marius points piously toward the reliquary.{/n} "In that gruelling fight, he not only treated the wounded soldiers but shed blood for the cause himself."

"He had the honour of helping an ancestor of yours capture this relic." {n}Marius points piously toward the reliquary.{/n} "In that gruelling fight, he not only treated the wounded soldiers but shed blood for the cause himself."

languages.text: « Il a eu l'honneur d'aider l'un de vos ancêtres à s'emparer de cette relique, {n}explique Marius en montrant le reliquaire.{/n} Lors de ce combat acharné, il a non seulement soigné les soldats blessés, mais aussi versé son propre sang pour la cause. »
languages.original_text: "He had the honour of helping an ancestor of yours capture this relic." {n}Marius points piously toward the reliquary.{/n} "In that gruelling fight, he not only treated the wounded soldiers but shed blood for the cause himself."

traits.locale_text: « Il a eu l'honneur d'aider l'un de vos ancêtres à s'emparer de cette relique, {n}explique Marius en montrant le reliquaire.{/n} Lors de ce combat acharné, il a non seulement soigné les soldats blessés, mais aussi versé son propre sang pour la cause. »

languages.text: «Tuvo el honor de ayudar a un antepasado suyo en la captura de esta reliquia». {n}Marius señala piadosamente hacia el relicario.{/n} «En aquel encarnizado combate no solo atendió las heridas de los soldados, sino que derramó su propia sangre por la causa».
languages.original_text: "He had the honour of helping an ancestor of yours capture this relic." {n}Marius points piously toward the reliquary.{/n} "In that gruelling fight, he not only treated the wounded soldiers but shed blood for the cause himself."

traits.locale_text: «Tuvo el honor de ayudar a un antepasado suyo en la captura de esta reliquia». {n}Marius señala piadosamente hacia el relicario.{/n} «En aquel encarnizado combate no solo atendió las heridas de los soldados, sino que derramó su propia sangre por la causa».

languages.text: “因为他有幸协助了您的先人得到这件圣物。”{n}马吕斯虔诚地指着圣骨匣。{/n}“在那场惨烈的战斗中，他不仅治疗了许多受伤的士兵，他自己也为正义的事业流了血。”
languages.original_text: "He had the honour of helping an ancestor of yours capture this relic." {n}Marius points piously toward the reliquary.{/n} "In that gruelling fight, he not only treated the wounded soldiers but shed blood for the cause himself."

traits.locale_text: “因为他有幸协助了您的先人得到这件圣物。”{n}马吕斯虔诚地指着圣骨匣。{/n}“在那场惨烈的战斗中，他不仅治疗了许多受伤的士兵，他自己也为正义的事业流了血。”

languages.text: 「彼はあなたの先祖がこの聖遺物を捕獲するのを手助けでき、それこそが名誉なのです」{n}マリウスは聖遺物を指差した。{/n}「その過酷な戦いで、彼は負傷した兵士を治療しただけでなく、自らも大義のために血を流しました」
languages.original_text: "He had the honour of helping an ancestor of yours capture this relic." {n}Marius points piously toward the reliquary.{/n} "In that gruelling fight, he not only treated the wounded soldiers but shed blood for the cause himself."

traits.locale_text: 「彼はあなたの先祖がこの聖遺物を捕獲するのを手助けでき、それこそが名誉なのです」{n}マリウスは聖遺物を指差した。{/n}「その過酷な戦いで、彼は負傷した兵士を治療しただけでなく、自らも大義のために血を流しました」

languages.text: "Er hatte die Ehre, einem Eurer Ahnen dabei zu helfen, dieses Relikt zu erobern." {n}Marius deutet fromm auf das Reliquiar.{/n} "In diesem grausamen Kampf hat er nicht nur die verwundeten Soldaten behandelt, sondern auch sein eigenes Blut für die Sache vergossen."
languages.original_text: "He had the honour of helping an ancestor of yours capture this relic." {n}Marius points piously toward the reliquary.{/n} "In that gruelling fight, he not only treated the wounded soldiers but shed blood for the cause himself."

traits.locale_text: "Er hatte die Ehre, einem Eurer Ahnen dabei zu helfen, dieses Relikt zu erobern." {n}Marius deutet fromm auf das Reliquiar.{/n} "In diesem grausamen Kampf hat er nicht nur die verwundeten Soldaten behandelt, sondern auch sein eigenes Blut für die Sache vergossen."

languages.text: "Sizin atalarınızdan birine bu yadigârı ele geçirmekte yardım etme onuruna sahip olmuş." {n}Marius büyük bir hürmetle kutsal emanet odasını işaret ediyor.{/n} "O zorlu savaş sırasında yalnızca yaralı askerleri tedavi etmedi, aynı zamanda dava uğruna kendi kanını da akıttı."
languages.original_text: "He had the honour of helping an ancestor of yours capture this relic." {n}Marius points piously toward the reliquary.{/n} "In that gruelling fight, he not only treated the wounded soldiers but shed blood for the cause himself."
